title: Hide admin dashboard link and enable access only via /admin URL

requirements.text: Remove the admin dashboard navigation link from the HeaderNav component so it does not appear in the main navigation menu for any users
acceptanceCriteria: The admin dashboard link is not visible in the HeaderNav component
Users cannot see or click an admin link from the main navigation
Admin functionality remains accessible through direct URL navigation

requirements.text: Ensure the admin dashboard remains fully accessible when users navigate directly to the /admin URL path in their browser address bar

quotes: dash board access should be there when used /admin in website address

acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to /admin in the browser address bar loads the admin dashboard
The OwnerGuard authorization check still applies at the /admin route
Unauthorized users see the AccessDeniedScreen when accessing /admin
Authorized admins can access and use all admin dashboard functionality via /admin

constraints: Do not modify the OwnerGuard authorization logic
Do not change the /admin route path
Preserve all existing admin dashboard functionality
nonGoals: Modifying how users are granted admin access
Adding new admin features or capabilities
